name: CTCarrier
desc: Information about the user’s cellular service provider, such as its unique identifier and whether it allows VoIP calls on its network.

items.name: var allowsVOIP: Bool
items.desc: Indicates if the carrier allows making VoIP calls on its network.

items.name: var carrierName: String?
items.desc: The name of the user’s home cellular service provider.

items.name: var isoCountryCode: String?
items.desc: The ISO country code for the user’s cellular service provider.

items.name: var mobileCountryCode: String?
items.desc: The mobile country code (MCC) for the user’s cellular service provider.

items.name: var mobileNetworkCode: String?
items.desc: The mobile network code for the user’s cellular service provider.
